data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
If you never turn right and always face forward you will always continue to face forward and the instructions on the board will return you to the beginning. So, the answer is No.

If you turn around you will be facing the same direction as you started from. So, the answer is yes.

When you turn to the back to return to the starting point, you start at the opposite side of the path the way you were. If you return to that direction, it takes 2 steps (step 4). So, the answer is No.
